verbs.description: [ARG1: california dmv worker] [V: fell] [ARG4: asleep] [ARGM-LOC: at desk] [ARGM-TMP: for nearly 4 years] a california dmv data operator fell asleep three hours a day at her desk for nearly four years despite complaints from her colleagues according to an audit released tuesday california state auditor facebook instagram dmv department of motor vehicles twitter youtube
